B

Book - Class in library.media
Represents a book in the library.
Book(String, String, String) - Constructor for class library.media.Book
Constructs a Book with a title, author, and ISBN.
BookFineStrategy - Class in library.fines
Calculates fines for overdue books.
BookFineStrategy() - Constructor for class library.fines.BookFineStrategy
 
Borrow - Class in library.borrow
Represents a borrowing record of a media item by a user.
Borrow(Media, User) - Constructor for class library.borrow.Borrow
Creates a borrowing record for a media item and user.
BorrowManager - Class in library.borrow
Manages borrow operations in the library, including borrowing media, checking overdue items, calculating fines, and listing borrows.
BorrowManager(List<User>, List<Media>) - Constructor for class library.borrow.BorrowManager
Initializes the BorrowManager and loads existing borrows from storage.
borrowMedia(Media, User) - Method in class library.borrow.BorrowManager
Allows a user to borrow a media item if eligible.
